Name: abhishekkharwar
AboutMe:
Passionate, committed, responsible and self motivated mobile software engineer with a wide range of technical skills focusing on mobile. With over 4 years of experience designing, architecting, implementing and adapting technically sophisticated software solutions using , iOS & Objective-C, MVC architecture and more. Self starter and team player with a keen interest to take on exciting challenges and work with cutting edge technologies.

Designed, developed and lead a number of iOS application that support day-to-day operations, improve scalability, performance and profits

Plan, develop and implement successful small to large-scale projects from conception to completion.

Expert in Objective-C development with a good understanding of object orientated design

Excellent analytical, time management, collaboration and problem-solving skills.
